titleInfo.title: Dear Elvis Presley Fan Clubs Card

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: One color card (blue on white) containing a letter from Hatch to Elvis Presley Fan Clubs and Fan Club Members offering a two color replica of the original letterpress show poster ordered for Elvis Presley's show in Jacksonville, Florida, on August 10 and 11, 1956. Card includes pricing and size information.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
